subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: If the Penguins do not have enough money to offer Marian Hossa, who emerged as the star of their second-round playoff series, the Rangers may be in the bidding for him.
snippet: If the Penguins do not have enough money to offer Marian Hossa, who emerged as the star of their second-round playoff series, the Rangers may be in the bidding for him.
